org.springframework.orm.hibernate5

Class SpringSessionSynchronization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.SpringSessionSynchronization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Flushable, org.springframework.core.Ordered, org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionSynchronization

    public class SpringSessionSynchronization
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionSynchronization, org.springframework.core.Ordered
    Callback for resource cleanup at the end of a Spring-managed transaction for a pre-bound Hibernate Session.
    Since:
    4.2
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller
